So here's how I see it from Ch.1&2. The husband new there sex life wasn't great and that he was busy with work. So he agrees to the sex advisor thinking it'll help there marriage, sex life and sure she's gets off a little in return. But he at least knows it's for the long term goal of helping there marriage and that it'll get there sex life to a point they can handle and it's with a pro who won't bring love into the equation to steal his wife or do it without a condom ect... Instead though he sees her becoming more of a slut than anything even going as far as buying lingerie and showing it to the pro before even the husband and caving to the pros dick by doing it with the pro 3 times a week and husband 1 time. So he decides to test her with a real life issue....he gets extremely busy at work and has to put off sex for a couple weeks. Now she's doing OK but he sees her falling and so the kicker is he tests what she would do if he couldn't come home for the anniversary right away.

Continue......Then what happens is what he thought, he waited a bit so to get home late to see if she'll be there or if she took the bait of going out with the sex advisor instead. Then he gets the call of yes she has cheated on him with two other guys not approved by the husband as far as she knows. He also gets to hear how she likes these guys better than the husband, does it with other men, does it raw and then lie about all of it. So he now has confirmed everything he thought, it wasn't to save there marriage or to help there sex life it was just her wanting sex plain and simple. So he gives it to her by leaving......... So now we will see what happens in the next part and see what the real plot is. But that's how I've been seeing it in my opinion. It could also be some revenge plot or maybe a he's tired of the wife and wants to sell her off. Or he gets off on all of it and was having fun......who knows!
